name: Xpack
tagline: A simple package manager for arch linux made by python
body:
# XPack XPack is a simple package manager for arch linux made by python. ## How to run xpack? First make sure you have the following-
  • python 2
  • python2-tk(Tkinter)
  • packer
Next download all the files in master. And last open an terminal and go to the directory with the files in it and type-
python xpack.py And your done! ## XPack wiki For the xpack wiki click here.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
